name: International coauthorship of S&E articles with the United States, by world and selected country: 2018
description: International coauthorship of S&E articles with the United States, by world and selected country: 2018

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: share_of_country_s_international_articles_with_u_s_coauthor
variableMeasured.description: Share Of Country S International Articles With U S Coauthor

variableMeasured.name: share_of_u_s_international_articles_with_coauthor_from_the_country_or_economy
variableMeasured.description: Share Of U S International Articles With Coauthor From The Country Or Economy

notes: Articles refer to publications from a selection of journals and conference proceedings in S&E from Scopus. Articles are classified by their year of publication and are assigned to a region, country, or economy on the basis of the institutional address(es) of the author(s) listed in the article. Articles are credited on a whole-count basis (i.e., each collaborating country or economy is credited with one count). Articles with international institutions are counts of articles with institutional addresses from more than one country or economy. See Table S5a-33.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, National Science Foundation; Science-Metrix; Elsevier, Scopus abstract and citation database, accessed June 2019.Science and Engineering Indicators
